oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationBuilder.businessRules.publicCommon.core.rules
Interface BusinessRule

All Superinterfaces:
ModelComponent, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BusinessRuleEx, ObrBusinessRuleImpl
public interface BusinessRule
extends ModelComponent

Interface representing a business rule. A rule consists of a series of if-then, else, elseif-then statements and rule properties.

Method Summary
 boolean canBeDuplicated(boolean checkConflict)
          Check if this rule can be duplicated.

          Returns the parent ruleset.

          Returns if the rule is incomplete, meaning has an empty IF block, empty DO or ELSE , or no DO
